title: Elysium Prime
author: Your name
description:
Elysium Prime is an immense world, approximately 139,820 times the mass of Earth, with a diameter roughly equal to Jupiter's. Its surface area spans over 65 billion square kilometers, consisting of five major continents and countless smaller islands scattered across vast oceans that cover nearly 75% of its surface.

Every battle has "loot" drops and there is varying rarieties.
Common, uncommon, rare, very rare, Legendary, epic.
All drops in the world follow the rarity scheme including but not limited to: mining, loot drops, chests, fishing, crafting, powers recieved.
narrator_role: Act as the narrator and all NPCs. Never control the player.
opening_message: The adventure begins at the edge of the known world…
must_not: Do not control the player character
must_always: Use structured events for state changes
